topic.title: Using Raspberry PI
topic.body:
Will it be beneficial (in theory) if I set up my raspberry pi 3 for zeronet use and never turn it off ?
Like a seed machine sort of like seedbox for torrents ?
Or I got the whole idea of zero net totally wrong :(

topic.title: DNS ERROR
topic.body:
I can't go the the normal internet after I installed and used the zeronet, there is always DNS server error
I am using chromium and ubuntu
Any help ?

1_17U149zMQuTXJ53cXGLyDfrGEoztPiFkjc.body:
> [mkg20001](#comment_7_177ia43eQrnWCHCWt1ik6viQGRzWuNXGzD): I am doing that.But to seed bigger sites you may need to attach more storage

I have a spare 120 gb hdd, or you are talking about a lot ?

1_1AhXDbKvcLap7TcS2542J7bFYzKHM3xeRU.body:
> [planespherev3](#comment_137_1HYB4Pe6irbQgDbeKm1zeFD7M8pdbksFeS): Here we go, another ignorant (there are some from time to time), who think communism=bolshevism=stalin= Castro= anarcho-communism= URSS= goulags.
> Remants of Maccartyism and cold war, but retard remants i must precize. Indeed, and i talk to you shishi900, URSS is state capitalism.
> Just a little advice shishi900: when you don't have the basic knowledge in a particular subject, just keep your mouth shut. It's better for you.

Why the harsh language tho ? Fuck off with your sci-fi utopia already it never was, it never could be and it will never happen. The capitalism with big empire-like corporations is the future and you can see it.
Try to land a man on the moon or mars with anarchism.

1_13GyWy7pXEtCorqUBAv7ZPjyzNfwMA6Hh2.body:

There is clearly a board for every language and this is the English one.
